text: Hi everybody, i am new on HubSpot and for a client i need foe one template email, integrate their post blog wordpress in their template email. i have a json file and i want generate a loop with HubSpot. can i to do this ?
You should be able to use the RSS Listing Module and then link off the .rss from their wordpress site to pull in the appropriate listings

Thanks <@U2H3TT8F2>, i found rss listing, duplicate it, know i will like modify the code generate by my duplicate module rss listing, it is possible ? for add picture, i will like create my code with all info i have need, with picture. here my file RSS <https://wordpress.thag.fr/flux-rss-test-HubSpot/>

Hi everyone. I have been using HubSpot for almost 2 years. But a task just came up and we need to display a listing the clients with custom properties in an email and we need to send to a specific email address every end of the month. Is it possible to have a looping of values in an email? And using only 1 custom property with many values? Thanks in advance! :slightly_smiling_face:
